root.name: The Mask
root.description: StoryThe Mask takes you through various places in Edge City where you meet known characters from the movie like Mrs. Peenman and Dorian. The Game is based on the 1994 movie but takes a few liberty's and adds a few more locations and characters.GameplayAs the Mask you have ability's like:Tornado SpinMalletSuper JumpGuns'Squeeze me Gently' HornSuper SpeedSneakLocationsStanley's ApartmentThe Streets of Edge CityEdge City BankLandfill ParkEdge City Jail HouseSewersThe Coco Bongo Club
